d1_text:
Npc0074:
ï¿½Your average policeman is stronger than any super hero![WAIT][GOSUB L_C68448]
[GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C683DE]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
[START_LINE]
ï¿½Oh... you won...[HALT][SET_FLAG ONETT_COP_2_DEFEATED]
[CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 74 238]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[PAUSE 30][SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 75 235]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
; $C5F9DD
Npc0075:
ï¿½Don't let the Mayor's compliments give you a big head...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Bring it on, fat boy![WAIT][GOSUB L_C6844F]
[GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C683DE]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
[START_LINE]
ï¿½Let's do this again sometime...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Next time, I'll take you out with my nuclear suplex attack![HALT][SET_FLAG ONETT_COP_3_DEFEATED]
[CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 75 238]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[PAUSE 30][SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 76 236]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
; $C5FA72
Npc0076:
ï¿½C'mon![LINE_BREAK]
  I'm going to take you apart right here, right now, baby![WAIT][GOSUB L_C68456]
[GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C683DE]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
[START_LINE]
ï¿½Grrr...[LINE_BREAK]
  I lost...[HALT][SET_FLAG ONETT_COP_4_DEFEATED]
[CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 76 238]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[PAUSE 30][SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 77 237]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½That's it, buddy...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You can forget about me, I'm going to call for my boss![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[SET_FLAG ONETT_COP_5_DEFEATED]
[CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 77 238]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[PAUSE 30][SET_OBJ_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 75 239]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½There is no way I can beat you in a straight competition, so...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½get ready for my ï¿½Super Ultra Mambo-Tango-Foxtrot martial arts!ï¿½[HALT][GOSUB L_C68464]
[GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C683DE]
[STOP_MUSIC]
[PAUSE 60][OPEN_TBOX 1]
[START_LINE]
ï¿½I didn't think you would do so well against the mighty Onett police force...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You want me to open the road to Twoson?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Hang on for a sec, I'll radio my staff and give them the word...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[CLR_FLAG FIVE_COPS_AT_POLICE_STATION]
[CLR_FLAG COP_AT_STATION_ENTRANCE]
[SET_OBJ_DIR 75 5]
[CREATE_OBJ_EMOTE 75 WALKIE_TALKIE]
[PAUSE 60][OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½*Beep, beep* ...*Click*... *Rrrr*[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½*Click*  Strong here... do you read me?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...*Krrrr* ...Hey!...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...It's me, Captain Strong!...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Okay, listen, a kid named [PRINT_NAME NESS] will be there in a few minutes...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½He's a kid in a red cap... I want you to open the road to Twoson for him...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I know that...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I know that!...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Don't ask me why, just do it!  That's an order! ...Strong out...[HALT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[PAUSE 60][DELETE_OBJ_EMOTE 75]
[PAUSE 30][CLR_FLAG TEMP_6]
[RESTORE_MUSIC]
[PAUSE 60][GET_DIR_FROM_OBJ 75 PMEMBER NESS][SET_OBJ_DIR 75 0]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½Well kid, I'm not going to question you now,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but I do want to see you again...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Good luck![HALT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[SET_OBJ_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 75 619]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[SET_FLAG PATH_TO_TWOSON_OPEN]
[CLR_FLAG CAPTAIN_STRONG_NOT_AT_STATION_DESK]
[CLR_FLAG POKEY_AT_HIS_ROOM]
[CLR_FLAG ALOYSIUS_AT_HOME]
[CLR_FLAG LARDNA_AT_HOME]
[END]
d1_lines: ï¿½Your average policeman is stronger than any super hero![WAIT][GOSUB L_C68448]
ï¿½Don't let the Mayor's compliments give you a big head...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Bring it on, fat boy![WAIT][GOSUB L_C6844F]

I'm going to take you apart right here, right now, baby![WAIT][GOSUB L_C68456]
ï¿½You can forget about me, I'm going to call for my boss![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There is no way I can beat you in a straight competition, so...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½get ready for my ï¿½Super Ultra Mambo-Tango-Foxtrot martial arts!ï¿½[HALT][GOSUB L_C68464]

ï¿½You want me to open the road to Twoson?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Hang on for a sec, I'll radio my staff and give them the word...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½*Click*  Strong here... do you read me?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Okay, listen, a kid named [PRINT_NAME NESS] will be there in a few minutes...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½He's a kid in a red cap... I want you to open the road to Twoson for him...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Don't ask me why, just do it!  That's an order! ...Strong out...[HALT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
ï¿½Well kid, I'm not going to question you now,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but I do want to see you again...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
